Tie Dye Tuesdays: Offer a weekly event where customers can come in and create their own tie-dye clothing items. Provide a variety of white t-shirts, socks, and other clothing items for customers to tie-dye, along with dye and instructions. This event can be a fun and creative way to encourage customers to express themselves and try something new.

Tie-Dye Tote Bags: Create a line of tie-dye tote bags that customers can purchase. These bags can be made from a variety of materials, such as cotton or canvas, and can be available in different sizes and colors. Customers can choose from a variety of patterns and designs, or they can create their own unique tie-dye design.

Tie-Dye Tees for a Cause: Partner with a local charity or organization and create a limited-edition tie-dye t-shirt. For every shirt sold, donate a portion of the proceeds to the charity. This can be a great way to give back to the community and promote a good cause.

Tie-Dye T-Shirt Subscription Box: Offer a monthly subscription box that includes a new tie-dye t-shirt each month. Customers can choose from different colors and patterns, and the shirts can be made from a variety of materials, such as cotton or polyester. This can be a fun and unique way for customers to receive a new and exciting tie-dye item each month.

Tie-Dye Workshops: Host workshops where customers can learn the art of tie-dyeing. Provide a variety of materials and dyes, and teach customers how to create their own unique tie-dye designs. This can be a fun and creative way to engage with customers and teach them a new skill.
